exceptions.exn: Expects a disjunctive pattern with 1 branch or a conjunctive pattern made of 2 patterns.

original: right. intro H. unfold applied_implies_input_state in H. destruct H as [e [H1 H2]]. destruct H2 as [H2 | [H2 | H2]]. - unfold correct_entry in H1. destruct H1 as [H1_1 [H1_2 H1_3]]. contradict H. exists e. split; auto. - destruct H2 as [p [entries [H2_1 [H2_2 H2_3]]]]. contradict H. exists e. split; auto. left. unfold correct_entry. split; auto. left. exists p, entries. auto. - destruct H2 as [p [es [H2_1 H2_2]]]. contradict H. exists e. split; auto. right. right. exists p, es. auto.
